divs: Sighting DetailsI had just walked out the kitchen door with a small bag of garbage and just happened to look up at the sky above the patio off the living room door and saw what looked to be a cigar ?? type object hovering over the same area I had recently sighted a bar bell type object, which I had previously reported to MUFON; which, also, had hovered in about the same section of sky. I then went in the house for a camera and woke my wife up and told her of my seeing the UFO. She too went out and also sighted the craft which was now in the NNW section and I got one picture of the craft but a second picture turned out really odd for my Kodak CX6330 camera.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Sedona
There were no other sightings in Sedona on or around October 2nd 2013
Summary: My wife and I saw a cigar type craft in Sedona AZ
